import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Undelete team"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/teams/{teamId}/undelete"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Restores a previously soft-deleted team so it becomes visible in lists and can accept memberships again.

**Prerequisites**
1. **teamId** - Use [GET /api/v1.0/teams](/docs/api/teams/list-teams) or [GET /api/v1.0/teams/all](/docs/api/teams/list-all-teams) to find the teamId, including deleted teams if available.

**Workflow Example**
1. Delete a team: [DELETE /api/v1.0/teams/\{teamId\}](/docs/api/teams/delete-team).
2. Restore it: [PUT /api/v1.0/teams/\{teamId\}/undelete](/docs/api/teams/undelete-team).
3. Verify by fetching team details.

**Minimal Required Fields**: `teamId` (path).

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"teamId","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
